archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Customer Contact Case Management
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
This is used by the Contact Centres in order to log and manage calls received.
The new MS Dynamics application will interface with the POL Exchange Server for the sending and receiving of emails. It will also receive data from MDM via a (currently) manual MDM to NBSC data extract process where a weekly file of Branch data changes is delivered to a file server location by Business Support services. The last data set will be a file from Royal Mail for national postcodes.
